law.catch_line: Minimum standards for special purpose and agency captive insurers to be set by administrative regulations.
law.text: The commissioner may promulgate administrative regulations to set minimum standards for the formation, structure, examination, and operation of a special purpose captive insurer or an agency captive insurer.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1620, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 252, Pt. XXXIV, sec. 2, effective April 25, 2006.
